page.title: 14Llangunllo Recreation
page.content:
There are a number of Clubs in Llangunllo. The W.I., part of the Powys/Radnor Federation, organises a yearly programme in which many local women take part.A rounders team under the W.I. auspices plays neighbouring institutes and recently won the League.
A Mothers Union is attached to St. Cynllo's Church and there is an Evergreen Club which organises activities for the Over_Sixties _ often Coach Trips which enable many of village bound people to go further afield.The Committee also try to solve problems, e.g. the lack of a chiropodist, which arise from the immense distances to be covered here.
** Continued... **
